title: Vasantha Rekha: Diamond Butterfly Chain in 22K Gold
materials: G-H color). Total gold weight: 3.690 grams. Total diamond weight: 0.71 carats (76 diamonds). Features our signature Hyderabadi polish for lasting shine.
features: A delicate chain featuring a charming butterfly pendant, meticulously crafted in 22K gold and adorned with glittering brilliant-cut diamonds. The pave setting ensures maximum sparkle. The chain has a smooth, comfortable feel.
colors: Warm yellow gold complemented by the dazzling brilliance of white diamonds.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift for birthdays. Can be paired with both traditional and western attire.
description: This exquisite chain seamlessly blends timeless elegance with modern design. The ethically sourced diamonds are meticulously set to maximize their brilliance, while the 22K gold ensures lasting value and durability. A versatile piece that can be cherished for generations.
